question:
Consider the following statements about the BHIM-Aadhaar App:
  1. It is the biometric-based indigenous payment solution which can be used even without a smartphone
  2. There are no charges for transactions through the App
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
BHIM-Aadhaar App is a biometric-based indigenous payment solution which will enable real-time bank-to bank money transfers even for those without a phone and at no additional cost. There are no charges for transactions through the App. During the launch of BHIM-Aadhaar platform, the prime minister announced two new incentive schemes, BHIM Cashback and referral bonus schemes. The Referral Bonus scheme aims to incentivise existing BHIM users for bringing new users on the BHIM platform and encouraging the new users to do transactions with others using BHIM or by referring new users on BHIM.
